categories: Category:Events of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Amma protest was a civil demonstration by the population of the city of Amma on the planet Bacrana. Protesting against Imperial atrocities, the demonstrators peacefully marched on Central Sector Square. The protestors were met by a line of Imperial stormtroopers backed by All Terrain Scout Transports who opened fire after the assembled masses refused to disperse.
